description: A mutation event is dispatched for attribute changes.

properties.description: Dispatched when the value of a property changes on this MutationEvent. This event bubbles. This event is not cancelable.
properties.name: AFTER_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED

properties.description: The name of the property that changed.
properties.name: attributeName

properties.description: The current value of the property that changed.
properties.name: attributeValue

properties.description: The current propagation target of the event.
properties.name: currentTarget

properties.description: The current propagation phase of the event.
properties.name: eventPhase

properties.description: If true, the event supports the bubbling phase of propagation.
properties.name: bubbles

properties.description: If true, the default behavior of the event on its target can be canceled.
properties.name: cancelable

properties.description: The time the event was initialized.
properties.name: timeStamp

properties.description: If true, propagation of the event beyond the current target has been stopped.
properties.name: propagationStopped

properties.description: If true, the default behavior of the event on its target has been canceled.
properties.name: defaultPrevented

properties.description: The unique ID of the MutationEvent.
properties.name: id

properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The index of the MutationEvent within its containing object.
